attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app expecting lots of things from our president trump. However, I was greeted with a virus installing in my phone. I’ve never been so disappointed. This caused my phone to crash and even shut down. I had to go get it fixed which ended up costing me $750. Just because the government is corrupt that doesn’t mean you could do the same to my phone. Download at your own risk 🙄Fix the problem ASAP

attributes.title: terrible app!
attributes.review: i can assure you that i am NOT one of those ignorant liberals from social media who are posing as trump supporters. YES, he is a rapist, and YES, he is a racist, and YES, he is exceptionally and abnormally terrible at spelling and grammar for how old he is, but i sure do love that big orange guy. even though he is (clearly) an amazing president, this is, sadly, not an amazing app. immediately upon opening it, the app diagnosed me with “kung flu” and threatened to mace me so that mr. trump could take a picture in the seat that i was sitting in. how rude!

attributes.title: terrible app!!! MUST READ:
attributes.review: this is a terrible app. first of all, i don’t know what makes him have the face to even get an app, i mean this app is awful. whoever maintains this trump app.. just stop. what’s the point of having an app? donald trump is the most disrespectful and immature person i’ve ever seen so i don’t see a need of him getting an app. he has put america into horrible positions especially during this time so this app is literally unnecessary. point blank.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Downloading this app was the worst decision I have ever made in my life. It never even opens up!! Every time I try to use it, it crashes, my phone gets extremely hot and then shuts down. My battery life has significantly decreased since I have downloaded the app and attempted to use it. Furthermore, it has somehow used up 90% of my storage and causes the functioning on my phone to be severely delayed. Please protect your phone and DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely astonishingly terrible app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it made my phone glaucoma and be a little freaky 🤭😳 all I wanted to do was praise bunker boy😭 it never works or let’s me have my opinion🙄and even the app yells at me! It says nasty things like being a Democrat is stupid😮😬 that’s low man. I wish I could give this app zero stars by the way it treated me,but unfortunately it will be getting 1 star😣-10/10 would not recommend this app.

attributes.title: THIS APP STOLE MY GIRLFRIEND?!?!?
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. Immediately after downloading, the app caused my phone to sprout arms, legs, and a head. They were, I admit, gorgeous. My girlfriend must have agreed because she left me to date the app. A week later and they were engaged. NOT! COOL! Not to mention that this app hates minorities. It punched me in the face just because I’m colored. Once again, NOT COOL! I am writing this review on my friend’s phone, as my old one is probably in Fiji having sex with my ex. One star >:(

attributes.title: The most horrible app on the planet!
attributes.review: This app took 48 hours to download and had my phone glitching for 3 weeks. All I wanted to do was support my president. But there were voices that told me they were going to kill my mom! But no this no good president is making life harder for us and our allies. We need someone with actual sense in the White House. He had no idea what he was doing for the start. Let’s make America great again but without him😘

attributes.title: Horrible!!!!
attributes.review: I went to download the app because I think that trump is the greatest and sexiest man alive. When I did so, the app took days to download. When it finally downloaded, my phone began to glitch horribly. I believe this was caused from the viruses downloaded through the app. In fact, I think trump is stealing my information personally. I do not condone this behavior. Very sad and disappointed. I wish I could have put 0 stars.

attributes.title: ✨DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT IS NOT SAFE ✨
attributes.review: On this faithful day I decided to support my love for the president 🇺🇸and download this app but I was shocked😳 to discover that it takes 2-3 days to install 😤 when it finally installed  my whole family got a virus 🦠 on their mobile devices and my pet fish 🐠 drowned I was shocked 😱and devastated 😫🤚🏻to know how many bad things would happen just by supporting our awesome American president 🇬🇧 needless to say I will not be downloading this app ever again ✨✨🧚

attributes.title: DISGUSTING AND SCARY APP AND DANGEROUS🤢🤢🤮🤮☺️✨
attributes.review: This app is the most disgusting app ever. 👎😾it asked for my phone number and I didn’t even put my phone number and TRUMP CALLED ME he told me very terrible things I got so scared 😟😿he said he was going to come to my house and kidnap  my dog 🐶 idk why he wanted my dog in the first place 🥇. Anyaways 🤷 trump a terrible pedophfile and this is the WORST APP that I ever downloaded in my life (DISGUSTING)!!!! 💅🏻💅🏻😢😢😢 ALSO He told me that he locked Barrón in his basement so I went over to save him. 🤪🤩🥰  #MANNYFORPRESIDENT2020
